content: you can find the free pattern here 1 you can find the lion brand yarn kit here 2 it is also a full video tutorial you can find here 3 the lullaby luna blanket is a beautifully crocheted baby blanket featuring a charming moon design and scalloped edges made with soft washable yarn for easy care it includes an easy-to-follow printable chart of the moon as well as a digital file to track your progress a full video tutorial is also provided making it simple to create a timeless piece that can be passed down or gifted to loved ones considered beginner level there is a full video tutorial pattern includes instant download pdf file us crochet terminology tech-edited pattern gauge video level - beginner+ materials - * 1000 yds/3 balls lion brand yarn baby soft weight 3 60% acrylic 40% nylon 459 yds/140 g dusty blue 920/109at * us g-6/4 0mm crochet hook * scissors * tapestry needle you can purchase the lion brand yarn kit pattern and yarn colors of you choice here - http //lionbrand sjv io/qjxqny 4 *** if you buy 2 patterns - use code 2patterns for 10% off if you buy 3 patterns - use code 3patterns for 15% off if you buy 4 patterns - use code 4patterns for 20% off *** patterns due to the electronic nature of my patterns i cannot offer refunds 1 https //cozynooksdesigns com/lullabyluna/ 2 http //lionbrand sjv io/qjxqny 3 https //www youtube com/cozynooksdesigns sub_confirmation=1 4 http //lionbrand sjv io/qjxqny
